message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.RO 

Reasoning: The paper deals with computer vision tasks such as optical flow estimation and next-frame prediction, which are typically associated with the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The use of a hybrid approach and a novel time-variant multi-tasking architecture suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques. The evaluation of results using an action classifier suggests a focus on multimedia (cs.MM) applications. Finally, the potential application of the proposed method in robotics (cs.RO) is also mentioned in the abstract.
